title: NFL Fever 2003
text:
NFL Fever 2003 is an <a href="American%20football">American football</a> <a href="video%20game">video game</a> published and developed by <a href="Xbox%20Game%20Studios">Microsoft Game Studios</a>. It was released in 2002 for the <a href="Xbox%20%28console%29">Xbox</a> video game console. The game, which was also used for beta testing for <a href="Xbox%20Live">Xbox Live</a>, was preceded by "<a href="NFL%20Fever%202002">NFL Fever 2002</a>" and followed by "<a href="NFL%20Fever%202004">NFL Fever 2004</a>".
Reception.
"NFL Fever 2003" received "average" reviews according to the <a href="Review%20aggregator">review aggregation</a> website <a href="Metacritic">Metacritic</a>. "<a href="IGN">IGN</a>" said: "In a nutshell, "Fever 2003" still does everything well that its predecessor did, while merely applying bandages and not true fixes to the things its predecessor didn't do well."
